text:
Question 161) A suitable eucalyptus foot suitable for cutting yields an average of 20,000 A4 sheets of paper. The superficial density of A4 paper, measured by the reason for the mass of a sheet of this paper by its area, is 75 grams per square meter, and the area of ​​an A4 sheet is 0.062 square meter.
Under these conditions, how many kilograms of paper yields, on average, an eucalyptus foot?
A) 4 301
B) 1 500
C) 930
D) 267
E) 93
